free: #e He prepared three baskets for holding the fruits, so he went to the farmland to pick (fruits).
#c 他準備三個簍筐，準備用來要裝果實的，所以他去田裡摘。
#n mi-patala cira tu ccay falud a nanum, sa-patala nira tu lafang 他準備一打水，準備要給客人喝。

free: #e His toil of picking fruits is reminiscent of our toil as farmers, like the farmers in our village.
#c 他摘水果的辛苦，使我想起我們農夫的辛苦，很像在我們部落的農夫一樣。
